item.description: This is Militia's home opener game, playing the New York Sharks. A championship ceremony will take place at 5:30. The stadium has a small parking lot, so we suggest arriving early. A food stand is available at the staduim. For more information on future home games, visit their website http://www.bostonmilitia.com. Kick off is at 6:00PM.

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Militia Women's Full Tackle Football
